Store.title: Store
Store.description: Represents a local store that lists products on LocalBasket.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Store entity.

description.description: A brief description of the store.

address.description: The physical address or location of the store.

ownerId.description: The UID of the user who owns the store.

imageId.description: ID for the store's placeholder image.

imageUrl.description: URL for the user-uploaded store image.

latitude.description: The latitude of the store's location.

longitude.description: The longitude of the store's location.

isClosed.description: A flag to indicate if the store is permanently closed.

Product.title: Product
Product.description: Represents a product listed by a store, with multiple price/weight variants.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Product entity.

name.description: The base name of the product (e.g., 'Potatoes').

description.description: A detailed description of the product.

variants.description: An array of different weights and prices for the product.

weight.description: The weight or size of the variant (e.g., '500gm', '1kg').

price.description: The price of this specific variant.

imageId.description: ID for the product's placeholder image.

imageUrl.description: The data URI of the AI-generated product image.

imageHint.description: A hint for the product image content.

User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the LocalBasket application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

firstName.description: The first name of the user.

lastName.description: The last name of the user.

email.description: The email address of the user.

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the user.

latitude.description: The latitude of the user's location.

longitude.description: The longitude of the user's location.

fcmToken.description: The Firebase Cloud Messaging token for push notifications.

Order.title: Order
Order.description: Represents an order placed by a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Order entity.

orderDate.description: The date and time the order was placed.

totalAmount.description: The total amount of the order.

status.description: The current status of the order (e.g., pending, processing, delivered).

deliveryLat.description: The latitude of the delivery location.

deliveryLng.description: The longitude of the delivery location.

deliveryPartnerId.description: The ID of the user who is assigned to deliver this order.

VoiceOrder.title: VoiceOrder
VoiceOrder.description: Represents a voice-only order placed by a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the VoiceOrder entity.

orderDate.description: The date and time the order was placed.

status.description: The current status of the order (e.g., pending, processing, delivered).

voiceMemoUrl.description: URL to the recorded voice memo audio file.

translatedList.description: The text transcription of the voice memo.

OrderItem.title: OrderItem
OrderItem.description: Represents an item within an order, pointing to a specific product variant.

id.description: Unique identifier for the OrderItem entity.

variantSku.description: The SKU of the specific product variant that was ordered.

variantWeight.description: The weight of the specific product variant.

quantity.description: The quantity of this variant in the order item.

price.description: The price of the variant at the time of the order.

ProductRecommendation.title: ProductRecommendation
ProductRecommendation.description: Represents a product recommendation for a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the ProductRecommendation entity.

recommendationReason.description: The reason for the product recommendation (e.g., 'Based on past purchases', 'Frequently bought together').

recommendationScore.description: A score indicating the relevance of the recommendation.

timestamp.description: The time the recommendation was generated.

MonthlyPackage.title: MonthlyPackage
MonthlyPackage.description: Represents a pre-defined monthly shopping package offered by a store.

storeId.description: The ID of the store offering this package.

name.description: Name of the package (e.g., 'Family Pack for 3').

memberCount.description: The number of family members this package is designed for.

price.description: The total price for the package.

items.description: A list of products and their quantities included in the package.

CachedRecipe.title: CachedRecipe
CachedRecipe.description: Represents a cached list of ingredients for a specific recipe to reduce AI calls.

id.description: Unique identifier, typically the normalized dish name.

ingredients.description: The list of ingredients for the dish.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the recipe was cached.

DeliveryPartner.title: DeliveryPartner
DeliveryPartner.description: Represents a delivery partner, tracking their earnings and payout status.

userId.description: The UID of the user who is the delivery partner. This is the document ID.

totalEarnings.description: The total accumulated earnings since the last payout.

lastPayoutDate.description: The date of the last successful payout.

payoutsEnabled.description: Whether the partner is eligible for payouts.

payoutMethod.description: The preferred method for receiving payouts.

upiId.description: The partner's UPI ID for payments.

Payout.title: Payout
Payout.description: Represents a payout request made by a delivery partner.

id.description: Unique identifier for the payout transaction.

partnerId.description: The ID of the delivery partner requesting the payout.

requestDate.description: The timestamp when the payout was requested.

completionDate.description: The timestamp when the payout was completed.

status.description: The status of the payout request.

payoutMethod.description: The method used for this specific payout.

payoutDetails.description: A snapshot of the payout details used for this transaction (e.g., UPI ID or bank account).

ProductPrice.title: ProductPrice
ProductPrice.description: Defines the canonical pricing for product variants, managed by the admin.

productName.description: The unique, case-insensitive name of the product (e.g., 'potatoes'). This serves as the document ID.

variants.description: A list of available weights and prices for this product.

sku.description: A unique identifier for the variant (e.g., 'prod-potatoes-1kg').

weight.description: The weight or size of the variant (e.g., '500gm', '1kg').

price.description: The admin-defined price for this variant.
